text: 3.16 Mat 3.11, Apo 13.25 Agel, ne takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd kɨlop pen agak, Takaw anɨb ak ma agɨnɨmɨb agak. Bɨawl yɨbɨl ak kɨdek ownɨgab agak. Ne bɨawl yɨbɨl, yad bɨ yokɨp agak. Nop nɨgen yɨp nebeŋ gup, tob tɨlup nop ak nag wɨsɨkɨnɨm tek ma lup agak. Yad nɨbop ñɨg pakñebin agak. Ne apɨl, God Kawnan ne ak sek mab mɨŋɨlaŋ sek nɨbop pakñɨnɨgab agak.
